item.title: Pay For Quality: Join App.net
item.description: I like paying for good software. There are applications I use every day, some for hours a day, that make my experience on the web and on my computers better. I have paid for ReederÂ on three platforms, Tweetbot on two1, Pinboard, and many others. I like to pay, because I value my time, my experience, and my productivity. I also like to pay because I value my privacy. Don’t get me wrong– I am a Google addict, using Gmail practically from the beginning, GChat, Google Calendar, Google+, Google Reader, etc, etc.
